DOC.brief_summary: The WARFARIN Study is a clinical trial designed to determine if the use of genetic information related to warfarin sensitivity can help create a dose of warfarin that will result in less hospitalizations and deaths related to warfarin.
DOC.brief_title: Warfarin Adverse Event Reduction For Adults Receiving Genetic Testing at Therapy INitiation (WARFARIN)
